1.Description: In 1955, Marcelle Leroy (more commonly and affectionately known as Lalou) took over the operation of Maison Leroy from her father, Henri. At the time, her father was determined to focus his attention on Domaine de la Romanée Conti - yes, that Domaine de la Romanée Conti. Lalou's skill as a taster made her a particularly astute choice to head up operations at Maison Leroy. Many producers in Burgundy in the early 1950s were blending cheaper wines from southern France and Algeria into their own. Lalou could not be fooled, and her ability to assess and identify authentic wines quickly set her and the Maison apart. For 63 vintages, she has collected and matured some of the finest wines in all of Burgundy for Maison Leroy - a task that has become more challenging as the number of growers producing wines under their own labels has increased in recent decades. Accordingly, the competition for top-quality remaining juice has become more intense; this is where Lalou shines. One of her measuring sticks is that the wines of Maison Leroy must approach the level of quality, provenance and refinement she attains in her own biodynamic vineyards at Domaine Leroy. The wines of Maison Leroy provide unique insight into Burgundy: insights forged through an uncompromising drive for quality.

1.Wine Name: Royal Tokaji Red Label 5 Puttonyos Tokaji Aszú 2013

1.Description: A blend of indigenous grapes in which the varieties L'Acadie and Ortega play a significant role.

The Anselmann family traces its viticultural heritage to 1126, but the family did not begin bottling and selling its own wines until 1959. This Beerenauslese will deliver a richly textured, fruity experience. Look for suggestions leaning to tropical fruit (passion fruit), peach and orange, with luxuriously integrated botrytis notes. The sweetness will be balanced by the vibrant, driving acidity that is always the engine of this style.

1.Wine Name: J.P. Chenet Chardonnay Reserve Pays d'Oc

1.Description: This is the half-size bottle of our popular Essentials product 35386. People just love it, and why not? Sourced from sites in Marlborough's Wairau and Awatere valleys, this is consistently crisp and fresh, bursting with characteristic aromas and flavours of cut grass, lime and lemon. This easy-drinking crowd-pleaser will hit all the marks.
Gold Medal winner at the 2017 New Zealand International Wine Show.

The Kautz family of Ironstone was the first to plant Chardonnay in the Lodi region. This Chard includes splashes of Viognier and Chenin Blanc and spent five months in new French oak barrels. Expect big, ripe tropical and orchard fruit flavours and pour with pork roast or crab cakes.

1.Wine Name: Flametree S.R.S. Wallcliffe Margaret River Chardonnay 2016
Domaine William Fèvre Beauroy Chablis 1er Cru 2016
JCB Les Ursulines Bourgogne Chardonnay AOC
De Wetshof Bon Vallon Unwooded Chardonnay 2014
1.Description: Though summer temperatures can be quite high, the Robertson region is unquestionably white wine territory, renowned for its Chardonnay and quality Sauvignon Blanc. The summer heat is mitigated by moisture-laden and cool southeasterly winds that make for cool nights and often foggy mornings, factors that help preserve the freshness and acidity of the grapes. This unoaked Chard will demonstrate crisp citrus flavours and a fine minerality imparted by the Chardonnay-friendly limestone soils.

Founded in 2007, Scribe is dedicated to the crafting of small lots of terroir-driven wines. This Chardonnay was first produced in 2007 and is grown in the cool Carneros region. The area provides a long, slow ripening period that allows the grapes to develop both fresh acidity and ripe, lush fruit flavour. Brothers Andrew and Adam Mariani are fourth-generation farmers and employ minimalist winemaking in an effort to best encourage wines of purity and precision.

1.Wine Name: Villa Raiano Alimata Fiano di Avellino 2015
Peake Ranch Sierra Madre Vineyard Chardonnay 2015
Château de Cabidos Cuvée Comté Philippe Petit Manseng Doux 2011
René Muré Côte de Rouffach Riesling 2015

1.Description: Joe Czerwinski awarded this wine 96 points, calling it 'one of Margaret River's (and Australia's) iconic Chardonnays.' (robertparker.com, Dec. 29, 2017)

1.Wine Name: Brazos De Los Andes White Blend
Jean-Marc Brocard Vau de Vay Chablis 1er Cru 2014

1.Description: Tom Gore is a second-generation grape farmer from Sonoma County whose passion for wine-growing led him to create his own wines. This Chardonnay was sourced from select Central Coast and North Coast vineyards, where cool nights and warm afternoon breezes ripen the fruit slowly. Look for pear and pineapple notes wrapped in a creamy texture and pair with lobster rolls or chicken fettuccine alfredo.

1.By:: Chris and Andrea Mullineux, Mullineux & Leeu Family Wines
1.Description: Tim Atkin named Chris and Andrea Mullineux his 2017 South African Winemakers of the Year.
This sustainably grown wine won a Silver Medal at Concours Général Agricole in Paris, 2008.

1.Wine Name: Duca Catemario Collezione Privata Pinot Grigio 2016

1.By:: Union Des Vignerons Associes Des Mo
1.Description: Saint-Véran produces only Chardonnay and the wines bear a close similarity to those of its renowned neighbour Pouilly-Fuissé, which actually divides the vineyards of Saint-Véran into northern and southern sections. These are wines noted for their aromas of peach and pear with honeysuckle, acacia, almond, spice and butter. They are crisp and fresh with citrus and smoky minerality joining the replays on the palate.
Double Gold Medal winner at the 2018 China Wine & Spirits Awards.

The Durell Vineyard is ranked by many as being one of the top five vineyards in Sonoma County. Its position in the southwestern hills of Sonoma Valley allows it to traverse three AVAs: Sonoma Valley, Sonoma Coast and Carneros. The volcanic soils of the site introduce a renowned minerality to the wines. The Three Sticks Chardonnay will be a classically styled wine with a plush texture, complex sweet fruit and spice and a crisp, long profile.

Galilee is the most northern and most respected winemaking region in Israel. The grapes for this wine were sourced from vineyards in Israel's coldest and most prestigious growing region, the Golan Heights, a volcanic plateau rising from 1,300 to 3,900 feet. Primarily Sauvignon Blanc and Viognier, this will offer bright citrus notes with intriguing tropical tones overlaid upon apple and citrus in a refreshing package.

This quirky blend-o-rama offers a pretty nose of apricot, citrus, flowers and lychee, with wisps of exotic spice. It's dry, smoothly textured, and shows a tangy balancing acidity. A lovely wine to sip on its own, or pair it with pad Thai.

1.Wine Name: Domaine Zind Humbrecht Goldert Grand Cru Gewurztraminer 2008
Domaine Ernest Burn Clos Saint Imer La Chapelle Goldert Pinot Gris 2010
Domaine François Lumpp Givry Clos des Vignes Rondes 2016
Domaine Louis Michel & Fils Vaudésir Chablis Grand Cru 2015
Maison Roche de Bellene Puligny Montrachet Champ Gain 1er Cru 2007
Domaine William Fèvre Montée de Tonnerre Chablis 1er Cru 2016
Awatere River by Louis Vavasour Sauvignon Blanc 2015
1.By:: The Awatere River Wine Company Limi

1.Description: TASTING NOTE: Sweet-kissed with intense floral, peach and yellow fruit character and a ribbon of crisp acidity running through it. Sip with spicy pork tacos or a fruit salad. (Vintages panel, Feb. 2018)

1.Wine Name: Bischöfliche Weingüter Trier Piesporter Goldtropfchen Riesling Kabinett
Pepper Tree Estate Grown Semillon/Sauvignon Blanc
Dr. H. Thanisch Berncasteler Doctor Riesling Spätlese 2006
1.By:: Weingut Wwe. Dr. H. Thanisch. Erben
1.Description: TASTING NOTE: Textbook Mosel flavors of peach, lime and slate highlight this silky-smooth, expressive Riesling. So appealing and juicy, you want to drink it now, but this will develop. Drink now through 2028. Score - 93. (Bruce Sanderson, www.winespectator.com, Feb. 29, 2008)

1.Wine Name: William Fèvre Bougros Côtes Bouguerots Chablis Grand Cru 2015

1.Description: Alison Napjus called this wine 'a minerally white, with a light, smoky underpinning ...' and '... a fresh, light-bodied frame ...' and suggested a drinking window extending through 2019. (winespectator.com, Oct. 31, 2017)

1.Wine Name: Sue-Ann Staff Estate Robert's Block Riesling 2009
1.Description: Robert's Block is named for Sue-Ann Staff's great, great, great grandfather, Robert Staff, who was the original settler on the property 200 years ago. The Riesling is the oldest block at 14 years of age. Enjoy this tremendous wine with crab cakes or ceviche.

1.Wine Name: Peter Michael L'Apr' Midi Sauvignon Blanc 2017
Peller Estates French Cross Sauvignon Blanc
Jackson-Triggs Niagara Estate Grand Reserve Chardonnay 2016
Simonnet-Febvre Mont de Milieu Chablis 1er Cru 2014
Château La Nerthe Clos de Beauvenir Châteauneuf-du-Pape Blanc 2015
Peter Michael Ma Belle Fille Chardonnay 2016
Santa Alicia Gran Reserva de Los Andes Chardonnay 2013
1.Description: Grand Gold Medal winner at the 2014 Mundus Vini wine competition.

1.Wine Name: Paul Hobbs Ellen Lane Estate Chardonnay 2014
Louis Jadot Meursault Les Charmes 1er Cru 2016
Louis Jadot Meursault Les Perrières 1er Cru 2016
Louis Jadot Puligny-Montrachet Les Folatières 1er Cru 2016
Louis Jadot Chassagne-Montrachet Abbaye de Morgeot 1er Cru 2016
Nico Lazaridis Queen of Hearts White 2017
Ken Forrester The FMC Chenin Blanc 2015
1.Description: The acronym emblazoned on the winery's flagship bottling, FMC, stands for Forrester Meinert Chenin - a nod to winemakers Ken Forrester and Martin Meinert, and to their assertion that this wine is not only their pinnacle expression of Chenin Blanc, but also a statement of challenge to the world. The fruit is sourced from low-yielding old bush vines and hand-selected over multiple 'tries successives' passes through the vineyard during the harvest season (the result being increased ripeness, richness and some botrytis complexity), before natural wild yeast begins the fermentation in new French oak barrels.

1.Wine Name: Vincent Girardin Les Chaumées Chassagne-Montrachet 1er Cru 2014
Michel Gassier Château de Nages JT White 2015
Chavet & Fils La Dame de Jacques Coeur Menetou-Salon Blanc 2015

1.Description: Double Barreled. Peach, pears and smoked oak characteristics all mingle in this full-bodied Blanco from Rioja. Barrel fermented and aged, it's soft in the mouth and has a lingering finish. 80% Viura and 20 % Malvasía.

1.By:: Familia Schroeder De Maria Y Adelin

1.Wine Name: La Joya Gran Reserva Sauvignon Blanc

1.By:: Sociedade Agricola Casa De Vila Nov

1.Wine Name: Peninsula Ridge Beal Vineyards Reserve Chardonnay 2009
Domaine du Pré Baron Sauvignon Touraine 2015
Clos du Bois Sonoma Reserve Chardonnay 2012

1.Description: Platter's awarded this wine 5/5 stars, calling it an '... elegantly balanced sauvignon, semillon duo.' (Platter's South African Wine Guide, 2018)

1.Wine Name: E. Guigal Ex Voto Hermitage Blanc 2013

1.Description: This wine was ranked #26 in Wine Spectator's Top 100 of 2012.
This wine was awarded the Chairman's Trophy at the 2017 Ultimate Wine Challenge.
Enjoy this aromatic and fresh white as an aperitif or with grilled seafood prepared in a lemon marinade.

1.Wine Name: Dürnberg L & T Falkenstein Grüner Veltliner 2015

1.Description: Ranked #82 on Wine Enthusiast's 2017 Best Buys list.

1.Wine Name: Thirty Bench Small Lot Wood Post Riesling 2014
1.Description: Gold Medal winner at the 2016 WineAlign National Wine Awards of Canada.

1.Wine Name: Pelee Island Winery Vendange Tardive Pinot Gris 2008
Pelee Island Time Riesling Vidal VQA

1.Description: Available at select VINTAGES locations.
Bright yellow-gold; citrus fruit with light tropical fruit & vanilla notes; dry with a zesty, citrus finish.
Available at select VINTAGES locations.
Available at select VINTAGES locations.
Available at select VINTAGES locations.

Always a snappy, fresh take on Ontario Sauvignon Blanc that hits all the markers. You can expect characteristic vibrancy and zest, tangy lime and grapefruit and touches of orchard and tropical fruit. Year in and year out, this is a wine that delights with its upfront fun flavours and nuanced definition. A great wine for summer salads or seafood.
Available at select VINTAGES locations.
Available at select VINTAGES locations.

1.Wine Name: Las Mulas Sauvignon Blanc Reserva Organic
Batasiolo Bosc D'la Rei Moscato D'Asti DOCG
Cellier Des Dauphins Prestige White CdRhone AOC

1.Description: This is a wine that not only tastes great but also gives back: a portion of sales are donated to the Ontario Association of Food Banks. You will find this to be a big, rich wine offering great depth of pear, pineapple, smoke, toast, butter and mineral notes. Enjoy this big-hearted wine tonight with grilled chicken or seafood.

1.Wine Name: Chateau du Cleray Muscadet Sevre et Maine
Small Talk Burning Ambition White VQA
Henry of Pelham Family Tree White 2016
1.By:: Henry Of Pelham Family Est. Winery

1.Description: Always a solid value, this PG offers delicate pear and honey with suggestions of apple and mineral. A great food wine for pasta primavera, light appetizers, turkey breast or grilled chicken.
Available at select VINTAGES locations.

1.By:: Union Des Grand Crus De Bordeaux

1.Description: A stone's throw from the shores of Georgian Bay, Coffin Ridge makes this Riesling in a crisp, bracingly mineral style with plenty of tangy citrus and green apple. All of their wines are suitable for vegans. This one will go nicely with vegan potato pierogies served with leeks and mushrooms sautéed in olive oil and garlic. It'll also suit grilled lake fish.

Zuccardi is one of the biggest and most trusted names in Argentine wine, and this unconventional blend of Chardonnay with 15% Viognier is a proven Vintages customer favourite. Always nicely balanced, bright and lively, with ripe apple, peach and tropical fruit embroidered by floral and honey overtones courtesy of the Viognier. It's a lovely pairing for carnitas with tangy pineapple-mango salsa.

1.Wine Name: Henry of Pelham Speck Family Reserve Chardonnay 2016
1.By:: Henry Of Pelham Family Est. Winery

1.Description: Traditional grapes with a twist: this is an off-beat blend of Riesling, Gewurztraminer and Chardonnay. Vivid pear, grapefruit, passion fruit, lime and stony mineral. Makes a great sipping wine, or pair it with spicy calamari or roasted pork tenderloin.

1.Wine Name: Recanti Yasmin White Chardonnay/Sauvignon Blanc KPM
Pierre-Luc Bouchaud Sur Lie Muscadet Sèvre et Maine 2016

1.Description: This Pinot Grigio from Zenato tends to lean toward the riper, more intense end of the PG spectrum. You can expect it to deliver a satisfying array of floral tones accented by lemon citrus, white-fleshed fruit and a pure mineral tone. It will be crisp and lively, and if antecedence is anything to go by, it will have a steely finish. Enjoy with grilled fish or chicken, or simply sip and savour.

1.Wine Name: 2027 Wismer Vineyard Fox Croft Block Chardonnay 2016

1.Description: This popular Chardonnay has gained a considerable following among Vintages customers, who are drawn to the quality and refinement it offers year in and year out. This will be a rich, creamy delight - a classic Sonoma Chardonnay featuring lifted acidity and lively, bright fruit. Pair this with grilled seafood, chicken or veal.

1.Wine Name: Sue-Ann Staff Fancy Farm Girl Frivolous White VQA
Viewpointe Estate Big Bluff White VQA
Louis Jadot Chassagne-Montrachet Abbaye de Morgeot 1er Cru 2015

1.Description: 'Albariño' is the Spanish name for the grape variety, known in its native Portugal as Alvarinho, that is prized in Spain for producing dynamic white wines bursting with notions of citrus blossoms, orange, grapefruit and peach. This one, the product of a co-operative of 428 growers that was formed in 2005, will impress with summer salads or lightly grilled seafood.

1.Wine Name: La Clarté de Haut Brion Blanc 2013

1.Description: Mason Cellars has been crafting fine wine since 1993. They began by producing Sauvignon Blanc, among the first in California to do so, before expanding their portfolio. The Pomelo line is crafted with an eye to offering expressive and refreshing wines that capture a little bit of the joy of the California sun.

'Carne Humana White is a blend of Sauvignon Blanc, Semillon and Chardonnay grapes from Napa Valley ... these 3 grapes are a guarantee of amazing nectar full on yumminess. The wine is fresh, with a hint of melon and pear and a spritz of lemon peel. It is a fab quaff.' (Phillip Silverstone, tickettoentertainment.com, Sept. 30, 2015)

1.Wine Name: Domaine Louis Moreau Les Clos Chablis Grand Cru 2014
Dirty Laundry Say Yes Pinot Gris 2016
Rockway Fergie Jenkins Limited Edition Riesling 2016
Dandelion Wonderland Of The Eden Valley Riesling 2015

1.Description: The Roger family has been making wine in the Loire Valley since the 17th century. Their Cuvée Gen'e Sancerre is made from Sauvignon Blanc grapes harvested, for the most part, in Le Grand Chemarin, one of the most famous vineyards in the village of Bué. Look for orchard fruit, freshly cut grass, mineral and citrus notes, and pair it with poached tilapia with lemon and dill, or chicken with fresh herbs and goat cheese.

1.Wine Name: Tzafona Cellars Cold Climate Unoaked Chardonnay KP 2015
Pfaff Riesling Cuvee Jupiter Alsace AOC

1.Description: Katherine's Vineyard (the vineyard) is made up of shallow sand and granite soils. You can expect Katherine's Vineyard (the wine) to be toasty with ripe notes of honeydew melon, pear, baked apple and citrus, with some lingering spice. Look for an elegant, creamy mouthfeel. Try with lobster with lemon-and-herb butter.

1.Wine Name: Famille Cattin Pinot Gris Alsace AOC

1.Description: James Suckling awarded this wine a rating of 92 points, calling it 'a fruitier style of sauvignon with sliced lime and hints of grass ... '(jamessuckling.com, May 29, 2017)

This is ever an alluring, toasty wine that offers up rich vanilla and tropical fruit in a generous, buttery package. A great favourite, it's amazing with grilled salmon, but its characteristic touch of smoke will make it work with barbecued pulled pork.

1.Wine Name: F.X. Pichler Riesling Loibner Loibenberg Smaragd 2015
F.X. Pichler Riesling Loibner Steinertal Smaragd 2015

1.Description: Platinum Medal winner at the 2017 National Wine Awards of Canada.

1.Wine Name: Ochota Barrels The Slint Vineyard Chardonnay 2016
Pascal Bouchard Les Clos Chablis Grand Cru 2011
Grover Zampa Art Collection Sauvignon Blanc 2015

1.Description: Pinot Grigio is a specialty of Moldova's winemakers. These wines tend to be aromatic and floral with intense peach and apricot tones. These wines make excellent sippers but can also be enjoyed with mildly spiced seafood dishes.

1.Wine Name: Closson Chase K.J. Watson Vineyard Pinot Gris 2017

1.Description: Pinot Gris has become Oregon's go-to white grape, outpacing Chardonnay for those honours since the turn of the century. Pinot Gris from Oregon is bigger and broader than Italian Pinot Grigio and is produced in a dry, crisp, aromatic style. This superb value example from A to Z keeps moving from strength to strength. The 2015 and 2016 vintages were both awarded 90 points by Wine Enthusiast. Expect flavours of apple, pear, melon and mineral, and try this with grilled chicken.

1.Wine Name: Les Vignes de Bila-Haut Côtes du Roussillon Blanc 2016

1.Description: Puligny-Montrachet Les Charmes is a lieu-dit situated next to Meursault's Premier Cru Les Charmes. Here, heavier clay soils mix with limestone to deliver wines that combine richness with elegance and minerality.

1.Wine Name: Domaine Christian Moreau Père & Fils Valmur Chablis Grand Cru 2015

1.By:: Gini Sandro E Claudio Soc. Agr. Sem
1.Description: Monica Larner awarded this wine a rating of 91 points and suggested a drinking window of 2017-2022. (robertparker.com, May 31, 2017)

1.Wine Name: Villa Maria Southern Clays Single Vineyard Sauvignon Blanc 2016
Felsengartenkellerei Besigheim Junge Cuveéschmiede Blanc de Noir 2015
Jean-Luc Colombo Les Collines de Laure 2015
Pères De L'Eglise Le Calice De St. Pierre Châteauneuf Du Pape Blanc 2016
Tawse Limestone Ridge-North Estate Bottled Riesling 2016
1.Description: Gold Medal winner at the 2018 National Wine Awards of Canada.

Kistler's Chardonnays are a master class in research, patience, dedication and focus. Few producers are as in tune with their terroir. Their Sonoma Mountain Chard is their only multi-site Chardonnay, crafted from select grapes from their best sites. It's like an elegant, Burgundian-styled flavour synopsis of their whole Chardonnay portfolio. David Lawrason awarded the 2015 vintage a rating of 95 points, calling it '... a delicious, layered and elegant chardonnay that captures the leanness and tension of good Burgundy and overlays some California fruit and charm.' (winealign.com, Nov. 20, 2017)

1.By:: Ignisis Limited Operating As Soul T

1.Description: The Irony Small Lot Reserve Chardonnay, like all of the Irony wines, is first and foremost crafted to please. Vintages customers have long loved this wine, delighting in the reliably full and creamy-textured mouthfeel and the ripe tropical fruit, vanilla and spice tones it always delivers. A real crowd-pleaser and one of Napa's best and tastiest values, this is always a superb choice for entertaining a crowd. A great pairing for spiced chicken, grilled veal or pan-seared fresh fish.

If you're in the market for a complex Riesling with vibrant floral, lime, peach and mineral notes, why not look to one of the most famous vineyard slopes in Germany, Wehlener Sonnenuhr? This will be a wine of context and precision. Enjoy it tonight with spiced pork or seafood, or allow it to evolve for another 8-10 years.

1.By:: Quinta Nova De Nossa Senhora D

1.Wine Name: Jean-Max Roger Cuvée Les Caillottes Sancerre 2016
1.Description: This is a perennial winner. Consistently crafted in a classic style, this Sauvignon Blanc will offer all the characteristic charm and beauty of Sancerre. Look for aromas and flavours of asparagus, gooseberry, grapefruit and smoky flint. You will also encounter the region's remarkable lively acidity and refined mineral undertone. Enjoy this with seafood or herbed chicken.

1.Wine Name: Fattoria dei Barbi Vermentino De Barbi

1.Description: Silver Medal winner at the 2018 Concours Général Agricole in Paris.

1.By:: Cantina Orsogna Di O.V. Orsogna S.C

F.X . Pichler Grüner Veltliner Loibner Federspiel Wachau 2016
F.X. Pichler Grüner Veltliner Ried Liebenberg Smaragd Wachau 2016

1.Description: The Sichel family, who also own Château d'Angludet, acquired Château d'Argadens in 2002 and since then have produced excellent wines at this estate. This 2016 Blanc blends 65% Sauvignon Blanc with 35% Semillon, lending grassy overtones to the gooseberry and pear fruit. Enjoy, lightly chilled, as an aperitif or with bouillabaisse.

1.Wine Name: Paul Jaboulet Aine Crozes Hermitage Domaine De Roure 2015
Il Botolo Chardonnay Affinato In Barrique 2015

Seraphine AOP Cotes Du Rhone White 2015

1.Wine Name: Texier Saint Julien En St Alban 2015
Joseph Faiveley Les Preuses Chablis Grand Cru 2014
1.Description: Preuses sits at the northern end of the grand cru slope, where Kimmeridgian limestone soils and ample sunshine shape the wines. The 2014 vintage in Chablis was given an impressive 4.5/5 by Decanter magazine, giving the Faiveley family (and their 200 years of wine history) more than enough to work with. This wine is poised to show well for decades.

1.Wine Name: Domaine Pinson Frères Mont de Milieu Chablis 1er Cru 2016
Domaine du Bois-Malinge Sur Lie Muscadet Sèvre et Maine 2016

1.Description: Sourced from an east-facing site and from vines over 30 years old, this is a wine that always demonstrates Chablis's characteristic crispness and minerality. Look for a wine with citrus and peach notes and a sharply detailed saline minerality. This will be superb with seafood dishes, but will also have the presence for pairing with roast chicken.
Silver Medal winner at the 2016 Concours des Vins du Val de Loire.

1.By:: Manincor Sas Az Agr Di Michael Goes

1.Wine Name: Manincor Reserve Della Contessa Alto Adige 2016
1.By:: Manincor Sas Az Agr Di Michael Goes

Fancy Farm Girl Frissonesque Sauvignon Blanc
Roche de Bellene Les Charrons Meursault 2009

1.Description: Domdechant Werner was the International Wine Challenge 2017 White Winemaker of the Year. Although this wine has notable residual sugar, its brilliant acidity gives a perception of dryness that will make it attractive to fans of dry Riesling.

Domaine Giuliani Châteauneuf Du Pape Blanc Cuvée Flora 2016

Wente Riva Ranch Single Vineyard Chardonnay 2015
1.Description: This wine was awarded a score of 96 at the 2017 San Francisco International Wine Competition.
Gold Medal winner at the 2017 Le Concours Général Agricole in Paris.

Weingut Tina Pfaffmann T No. 9 Riesling Trocken 2016

Arkos Vinho Verde DOC Branco White 2016
Marco Felluga Collio Mongris Reserva Pinot Grigio 2015
Studert-Prüm Maxiominhof Wehlener Sonnenuhr Riesling Kabinett 2016

1.Description: The Mantra is built to be enjoyed, and then enjoyed again, and then again and again and - well, you get the idea. An approachable crowd-pleaser, you can expect this blend of Chardonnay, Sauvignon Blanc, Auxerrois and Riesling to offer up tropical pineapple, lime and honey tones with a mineral undertone. Look for touches of spice as well. A great choice for barbecued pineapple or grilled chicken.

1.By:: Prinz Von Hessen Weinhaus Gmbh + Co
Mixed Nuts, Llc Dba Argot Wines

1.Wine Name: Pascal Bouchard Vaudésir Chablis Grand Cru 2012
Alphonse Mellot Génération XIX Sancerre Blanc 2014

M. Chapoutier Muscat de Beaumes de Venise 2016
